attributes.action: Consumer compensation for fake delivery attempts or delays
attributes.additional_details: Either fine parcel couriers for delays and fake missed deliveries (they have GPS in their vans to prove it), or allow consumers to receive compensation.
attributes.background: Parcel companies often claim a package has had delivery attempted when it hasn't. This robs the public and businesses of time and vital goods on a regular basis. The public and businesses should be entitled to compensation.

rejection.details:
The following petition covers a very similar issue: 

Stricter laws for delivery companies: provide location info & access to parcels 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707922
